Architecture¶

This project consists of three main layers:

Web Layer (Flask)¶

Serves the analysis page and handles user actions.

ETL Layer¶

Scrapes, cleans, and loads Grad Café data.

Database Layer¶

Stores rows and supports analysis queries.
